name: The Coffin - Halloween One Shot
description:
The Coffin is a halloween one shot of "The Masked One." 16 black and white pages, with a black cardstock cover and lino print. I originally printed 15 - only have 5 left after Comics and Zine fest. When I sell out, I will reprint more. To see more of the Masked One comics, go to:
  • Smack Jeeves

name: The Masked One 2# The Bridge
description:
16 pages, 4 1/4" X 7" inch, full color comic adventure. Comes in a variety of different 2 to 3 color Lino Block Relief print covers - from teals to salmon reds. Unless you want a particular cover, I will just sell them in order - from 1 to 30. If you do want a certain one, just tell me in your order :) A limited edition of 30 copies. The Story: On her way from the town, she decides to a take an ill-advised shortcut through the woods. There she encounters a unpleasant surprise: a river! Instead of crossing it, her fear of water makes her search for a bridge... If you have any questions or requests, feel free to contact me! Thanks for looking! And please check out the Masked One comics at these sites:
  • Smack Jeeves
  • Tumblr

name: The Masked One 1# Comic
description:
The first issue in the Masked One series. Six full colored comic pages. All zines are signed by the author/artist, Sam Coaass. And on request, can come with a doodle of choice. Plot: A mysterious masked girl roams the Medieval British countryside, conning, stealing and bartering her magical powers to the helpless countryfolk. All done in the name of getting a full meal. Little is known about her, other then she seems to never age throughout the centuries... If you have any questions or requests, feel free to contact me! And like always, thank you for looking! To see more pictures and info, go to
  • The Masked One
  • Tumblr
